'''2.3.136''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on April 12, 2022 as a beta version for {{w|Microsoft Windows|Windows}}, {{w|macOS}} and {{w|Linux}}, on April 20, 2022<ref group=note>The date of the inspection, the actual release date could be earlier.</ref> as a beta version for {{w|Microsoft Windows|Windows}} (New Launcher), and on April 22, 2022 as an non-beta version for all these platforms.

== Additions ==
* Added Setting that lets user review the Launcher on the Microsoft Store from within the Launcher.

== Changes ==
* Updates to some error messages to make them more useful.
* Various Launcher bug fixes, stability improvements and updates to distribution pipeline.

== Fixes ==
* {{Bug|MCL-21100}} - Game output log cuts off messages and does not show scroll bar.
* {{Bug|MCL-21109}} - Some selected buttons and fields can't be interacted with using both the {{key|Space}} and {{key|Enter}} keys.
